hypothesis_content.title: BTC Weekend Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC's 4-hour Bollinger Band width (20,2) compresses below 0.015 during Friday's US trading session (12:00-16:00 EST) in a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout in either direction exceeding 1.5% from Friday's close by Sunday 18:00 UTC will continue in that direction for an additional 2-3% over the next 24 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend liquidity thins often exacerbates moves that break out of compressed volatility periods. Friday's US session compression indicates indecision; a weekend breakout on lower liquidity tends to have follow-through as Asian/European Monday sessions react.
entry_conditions: Sunday 18:00 UTC: Price P_s > P_f * 1.015 OR P_s < P_f * 0.985
